statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts
SELECT id, email, is_admin FROM user_accounts
SELECT username FROM user_accounts WHERE is_admin = TRUE
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%'
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE is_admin = true ORDER BY email DESC
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND is_admin = false
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000') ORDER BY username
SELECT id, password FROM user_accounts WHERE is_admin = true OR email = 'admin@example.com'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_sessions ORDER BY expiration_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, session_token FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'jo%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'alice_smith' OR email = 'alice@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT display_name, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE display_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE users.user_id > 3;
SELECT user_id, email, display_name FROM users WHERE display_name IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT users.username, authentication_logs.login_time, authentication_logs.logout_time FROM users INNER JOIN authentication_logs ON users.user_id = authentication_logs.user_id WHERE users.user_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts
SELECT username, email FROM UserAccounts ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT full_name, grade_level, student_type FROM StudentProfiles WHERE grade_level > 10
SELECT teacher_id, full_name, experience_years FROM TeacherProfiles WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY experience_years ASC
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM CourseEnrollments WHERE completion_status = 'incomplete'
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, grade_level FROM StudentProfiles ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT full_name, subject_taught, experience_years FROM TeacherProfiles WHERE experience_years >= 5;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM CourseEnrollments WHERE completion_status = 'incomplete';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE ur.role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT u.username, ua.activity_name, ua.activity_date FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id ORDER BY ua.activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, pr.reset_token, pr.created_at FROM users u JOIN password_reset pr ON u.user_id = pr.user_id WHERE pr.created_at > '2022-01-01';
